geographical_features: large territory with mountains, plateaus, deserts, and fertile river basins; access to the Pacific Ocean; major rivers (Yangtze, Yellow River)
climate: varied — tropical in the south to subarctic in the north
economic_strengths: manufacturing powerhouse, advanced electronics, AI and ICT growth, infrastructure development, renewable energy leadership, large domestic market
digitalization_level: very high — leading in mobile payments, AI infrastructure, 5G
political_economic_threats: demographic aging; real estate market imbalances; tech sanctions; regional inequality; tensions with USA and neighbors
military_threats: Taiwan Strait tensions; territorial disputes in South China Sea; cyber competition; rivalry with USA
development_milestones: rapid economic growth since 1980s; global manufacturing dominance; major investment in AI, quantum tech and infrastructure
